Jill Bargonetti bụ prọfesọ America na Mahadum City nke New York nwere nhọpụta abụọ na Hunter College na The Graduate Center
Nnyocha ya lekwasịrị anya na protein suppressor p53 yana ọrụ ya dị ka oncogene mgbe ọ na-agbanwe na ọrịa kansa ara.
Amụrụ ya na onwa iri, na afọ 1962 na ụlọ ogwụ no na Obodo New York, Jill Bargonetti bụ ada Adah Askew na Arthur Bargonetti
Jill bụ ngwaahịa sitere na njikọ agbụrụ dị n'etiti nne ojii na nna onye America America
Ọ tolitere na mmepe ụlọ Mitchel-Lama nke nwere ọtụtụ agbụrụ na ọdịbendị dị na Manhattan's Upper West Side
Bargonetti gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha pụrụ iche nke New York City atọ: Hunter College Elementary School, Hunter College High School na Bronx High School of Science
Ọ gara n'ihu na mahadum steeti New York na Purchase ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na bayoloji na ịgba egwu wee nweta nzere BA na Biology
O nwetara Masters ya na Mahadum New York na 1987 wee soro ya Ph.D
sitere na NYU na 1990
O mere mmekorita postdoctoral na Mahadum Columbia site na 1990 rue 1994, ebe ya na Dr
Carol Prives rụkọrọ ọrụ
N'ebe ahụ, ọ kọwara ọrụ dị mkpa nke p53 dị mkpa maka nkwụsị ụbụrụ yana na ha furu efu mgbe p53 gbanwere na ọrịa cancer
Ọkwa ọkachamara mbụ Bargonetti na 1980 bụ onye na-agba egwu ya na ụlọ ọrụ ịgba egwu Harlem akpọrọ Dianne McIntyre's Sounds in Motion  yana dịka onye nyocha nyocha na Mahadum Rockefeller
N'ịgbaso ọzụzụ doctoral na postdoctoral ya, na 1994 Bargonetti ghọrọ osote prọfesọ na The City University of New York na nhọpụta na Hunter College na The Graduate Center
Ọ họọrọ Mahadum Obodo New York n'otu akụkụ ka ọ bụrụ ihe nlereanya maka ndị ọzọ sitere na otu ndị na-akọwapụtaghị ya na sayensị

Na 1997, e nyere ya ihe nrite onye isi ala Early Career Award maka ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na ndị injinia sitere n'aka Onye isi ala Bill Clinton maka "ọrụ ndị ọkà mmụta na ọrịa cancer metụtara ọmụmụ mkpụrụ ndụ na mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa na itinye aka nke undergraduate, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na karịsịa ụmụ akwụkwọ nta na usoro nchọpụta."  Ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ zuru oke na kọleji Hunter na 2007 yana Onye isi oche nke MCD PhD subprogram nke CUNY Graduate Center na 2009
Bargonetti jere ozi na ọtụtụ kọmitii mba iji nyochaa sayensị na amụma

Ụfọdụ n'ime nhọpụta ya gụnyere 2012-2018 Membership na National Institutes of Health (NIH) Tumor Cell Biology Study Section Review Committee na onye na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye otu National Cancer Policy Board site na 2002 ruo 2005
E gosipụtara Bargonetti na usoro PBS nke a na-akpọ "Ụbọchị Ngụsị Akwụkwọ America" na 2015
Na mgbakwunye, o kwuru okwu na mmemme TedX "Borders and Belonging" na Mahadum City nke New York (CUNY) na 2016
Achọpụtara ya dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum New York nke Arts na Sciences: Alumna dị iche iche  na SUNY Purchase Presidential Distinguished Alumna
Na 2017, a kpọbatara Jill Bargonetti na Bronx Science High School Hall of Fame.
